website_summaries.verdict: A nice option for kids who like cats, but it's not ideal for everyone, and may even frighten some youngsters.
pros: Bootsie the cat stands out for the cute expressions she makes when waved at or offered treats
Purrs when cuddled, also hisses and meows
cons: Random meowing can be somewhat annoying
Several reports of malfunctioning after a few months
Some kids don't like the hissing effect

customer_reviews.title: Super cute... but big packaging "flaw"
customer_reviews.text: Just received Bootsie in the mail, and immediately my daughter heard a "meow" and started looking around for a cat! Thankfully she didn't realize it came from the box. I left the box in the garage until she was asleep, since the box kept meowing and purring! I had to completely remove the toy from its packaging in order to turn is switch from DEMO to OFF. Super cute and I'm sure my daughter will love it, but I think it's a huge mistake from the maker that you have to remove the product completely from its packaging in order to silence it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size, Large, Pay attention to the packaging choice
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! Bigger than thought, which is good! Not loud enough to be annoying but interactive enough the girls both love it. Only thing I didn't realize when ordering is that I guess I picked the less packaging option & it didn't come in the fun bright kid friendly box pictured but a plain completely covered up brown cardboard box so if you're gifting to a young child be aware of the packaging choice (totally my fault for not noticing). I'm all for being green and all but takes away from a little kids wow factor.
customer_reviews.author: Katy F

customer_reviews.title: Almost as loved as our real cats!
customer_reviews.text: We stumbled upon Bootsie at Target. After seeing our baby's reaction, how could I not ask Santa to bring it? (Luckily he complied, so Christmas morning, our toddler was very excited to see Bootsie waiting under the tree!)
customer_reviews.author: Jen Estes (YA Author)

customer_reviews.title: Cute but annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Arguably the most annoying toy ever, EVER, made. Seriously, I wish this fake cat had real claws so I could let it claw my ears off. Just when you think it's "asleep".. MEOW!. Great way to test out your situational awareness level at midnight and you're sound asleep. She'll keep you on your toes. 5 stars because my two year old (unfortunately) loves this thing and it's also pretty cute. Better than a real cat, though that's probably debatable.
customer_reviews.author: Alli Moore

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after a month.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter's Christmas. She loved it as soon as she got it, however within a month the cat quit working. It no longer moves make any other noise besides anger and that doesn't even fully play out. My daughter's is extremely sad about her cat not interacting with her anymore. If you want to get a FurReal Friend, I would suggest possibly putting more money into it.
customer_reviews.author: Master Link

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this purchase at all
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these for Christmas presents for my Granddaughters. One of them worked and one does nothing. It now says I can't return it or receive a replacement. Not happy with this purchase at all. I have a very sad little girl today. What do you do if a gift you are giving is defective and the replacement window of 30 days is gone?????
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy pet
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves cats (we don't have any), so Santa got her this cat. She was so excited! It is soft on the outside, it does make a lot of purring sounds when you pet her. It doesn't always want to eat the fish, so I think this cat is kind of moody, haha, but it makes it more fun. It moves eye-brows in a weird/funny way (kind of freaky, as my boyfriend says). Moving eye-brows, making sounds, this cat definitely has quite a personality. It's an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia W.

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: We weren't sure if it was for kids smaller but the kids all 7, at this party, were scrambling to play with it. It is sent in Demo mode, so it meows and reacts even if facing a corner! Yes! As soon as the light comes on it makes noise. Very funny feature when you tap the nose it hisses and eyebrows frown at you, it is a riot! Bought extra batteries at the same time so the kids couldn't deny the grandkids of the fun hahaha. Very soft fur, hard inner body but id does cuddle with you, and I would definitely buy this for someone who would rather not have the real thing for their kids.
customer_reviews.author: CLINKC

customer_reviews.title: FurReal cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter for Christmas! She absolutely loves it! She has carried it everywhere, especially to bed where it meows all night. It was really a random purchase, but it has been her favorite so far and she plays with it everyday! I think her exact quote was, "Mom, I will have this cat forever!" It's always a plus in my book if she plays with a toy everyday and she certainly loves this cat!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Very verbal
customer_reviews.text: This one is very vocal and engaging. (I actually had to hide the gift until we were ready for her to open it since it was in Demo mode and would keep meowing from inside the wrapped box.) Seems to have great battery life for all it's activity. Would be nice if someone made these more cuddly/softer instead of the cheap cover over hard plastic, but compared to the others we've used (the panda for example was worthless, hardly ever responded to anything) this one was a good purchase. Also the eyebrows and ears movement is a great bonus the kids get a kick out of.
customer_reviews.author: R&M Ho

customer_reviews.title: Our Bootsie does not work as shown in video.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Christmas gift for our little granddaughter - disappointed when it arrived in a brown box instead of the packaging shown on web page that I ordered from. When granddaughter opened and took out on Christmas morning, the cat looked a little worn? It stated on the page that it was ordered from that it was new. It doesn't work as shown in the video. It does not respond to hand waving, it does not respond to the fish, it does not show all the emotions as demonstrated in the video. We had high hopes, but think we have a defective cat!
customer_reviews.author: Dale C

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is on her 4th Bootsie kitty. She takes the newest one with her everywhere as well as sleeping with it. I wish we could wash it but that won't work because of the electronics inside which is why we have bought so many. (And this would be the only reason I've give this review 4 stars instead of 5.)
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS TOY
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughters wanted a LUV PUP for Christmas. I bought 1 and I bought 1 of these FurReal Bootsie Interactive Kitty Toy. This is SOOO much better then the LUVPUP. This kitten really interacts with you. Its soft, it purrs, meows and moves around like a real cat. It also gets angry. It does so much more then the LUVPUP and my daughter just loves it. I would highly recommend this!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Busymom

customer_reviews.title: hisses and when you feed her she is happy. The fish makes her purr
customer_reviews.text: FurReal Friends Bootsie My granddaughter loves the cat. She purrs, hisses and when you feed her she is happy. The fish makes her purr. Her eyebrows move up and down and her ears move also! She is very soft! Make sure if this is a gift to take the batteries out of Bootsie. If you don't she will purr and hiss the whole time she is in the package, then the batteries will die!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Really cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter wanted this for Christmas. I was a little reluctant to order it as I thought it would be obnoxious, but it's actually pretty dang cute. She carries it everywhere with her and sleeps with it every night. I switch it to off when she goes to bed so it won't wake her up. Pretty cute toy and it makes my daughter happy. She likes this more than the real puppy we surprised the kids with for Christmas. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: MBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy with super epic eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: This little kitty with its Groucho Marx eyebrows is the cutest. It is definitely not a soft snuggly plush that you would want your kids to sleep with, it is animatronic and it feels that way when you hold it. I find it funny that it purrs and such, but also growls and hisses with a lil angry face. Cool toy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy D.

customer_reviews.title: Love it and hate it.
customer_reviews.text: I have a love hate feeling about this cat. It's cute and soft and cuddly but the purring gets rather annoying. It's sensored so you can just walk by and it starts to purr. Worth $50...probably not. It was played with for a short time. And if you're giving it as a gift, it's not very discreet as the cat purred the entire time it was packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Of 3

customer_reviews.title: Just a heads up unless you like to explain why a box is meowing
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for a 7 year old and a big hit. ***notice- this cat is in full demo mode when it arrives. I ordered early and had to hide in the back of the garage to keep anyone from hearing it. My daughter finally heard one day and the surprise was over. You would have to complete take it out to turn off. Just a heads up unless you like to explain why a box is meowing, hissing and purring..
customer_reviews.author: SeahorseOwl

customer_reviews.title: the cat is adorable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it one star because of the condition when it arrived. The Amazon box was undamaged, so a sloppy box was shipped knowingly. Not sure where the on/off switch is. The toy keeps meowing and purring. This was a gift for an Angel Tree recipient so I'm reluctant to open and look for the off switch. Other than the condition of package, the cat is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Normally these toys annoy me but this is actually really cute
customer_reviews.text: Normally these toys annoy me but this is actually really cute. I refuse to get a real cat so this is perfect for my 6 year old that loves them. You can also turn it off which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, doesn't do more in play mode.
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy! This one one of the main items on my daughters Christmas list. It really only does the things it does in demo mode at the store, but if still really cute. We were used to fur real friends doing more in play mode than demo, moving more of its body. This toy turns her head, eyebrows, and makes a variety of noises. Not super impressed, but still pleased with this toy. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old adores this! She loves cats but our home doesn’t need another animal so I figured this was the next best thing. I was so right as she can carry this around all day and I don’t think a cat would appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a present for my 6 year old. She played with it in the store and loved it. When it arrived it was in great shape, it's eyes move it makes lots of sounds, so I turned it off so it wouldn't be a dead give away when the box was moved. The cat is interactive and just plain cute. The best part you don't have to buy food or litter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can you hear me now?
customer_reviews.text: It showed up on time, talking.... Throught the box it talked from arrival to Christmas.. Its a fun toy for my daughter! She is 3 and loves it
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Morales

customer_reviews.title: Really!!!???😖
customer_reviews.text: Really???? Seems like i bought this used!! What happened to the original packaging??? It’s supposed to be a gift and I’m seriously disappointed!!! returning it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve ibarra

customer_reviews.title: This thing is wonderful! She loved it so much she started kissing ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is wonderful! She loved it so much she started kissing it right out of the box. Just know that even while wrapped it's so sensitive to movement and light that it would start purring and meowing if you just turn on the light or moved the package. It scared me a few times until I learned to expect it. But if you're giving it as a gift you will have to plan for that so it doesn't spoil the surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Lover

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.  Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! Don't do much, didn't keep her attention for long, but shes 6 now and would still mess with it for a sec, then move on to something else. So I guess it's. It that bad... I recommend for a 3 or 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanna Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this exact cat when she was 1 years old. After 4 years it got very tatered and needed to go. I found this same one online with al the prices and she about cried when she opened this "new baby" for her birthday! Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: KatrinaW

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE ELDERLY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mother. She lives alone and is unable to care for a live cat. She adores my cat. I gave it to her for Christmas and she loves it.. The various sounds and interactive quality make it better for her than a simple plush animal. It helps bring stimulation to her long too quiet days.
customer_reviews.author: DKP

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My six year old niece LOVED this cat - the purring, hissing, the whole bit! The facial expressions were hilarious! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M Pering

customer_reviews.title: Adorable. Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Fur is Soft. Nice size. It responds at the smallest motion. Every time I walk past it in the box, it does something. This price is the best I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive cat
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite in our house. We've had it for years and it still works. We shut it off when not using it, to avoid it making random noises, but it is fun and the movements and sounds make the kids laugh. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: ShopToo

customer_reviews.title: BOOTSIE is awesome, there are very few animatronic dolls at this price point that can entertain kids the way bootsie does...
customer_reviews.text: BOOTSIE is awesome, there are very few animatronic dolls at this price point that can entertain kids the way bootsie does...
customer_reviews.author: MaddsPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, battery eater and functional toy.
customer_reviews.text: Is a very beautiful and functional toy. Your body is a little too hard. But the biggest flaw is that it eats too much battery. Could have some rechargeable model like a smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: TopoFlier

customer_reviews.title: 3yr old daughter adores this cat. She sleeps with ...
customer_reviews.text: 3yr old daughter adores this cat. She sleeps with her and takes her everywhere. I was really surprised at how soft the fur is! I even catch myself petting the darn thing!
customer_reviews.author: JB81

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best gift which I bought for my granddaughter. She loves it! Everyday she will talk to the cat and the cat will also give her response. She said this cat is her the best friend!
customer_reviews.author: Germaine Tsuei

customer_reviews.title: Save Yourself, Your Sanity & Your $$
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t.... unless you’re OK with hearing it meow over, over, over, over and over to the brink of insanity.
customer_reviews.author: JandKTamargo

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Loud.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but so loud. It came in the mail already meowing. I bet the post man was a little confused. Its hard to secretly wrap a toy that is constantly meowing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalynn

customer_reviews.title: We Love
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old loves this beyond and her 4 year old cousin also wants to steal it from her. Big fights over it. A huge hit. We love
customer_reviews.author: LA Bae

customer_reviews.title: Cute ish
customer_reviews.text: I think it's kinda cute but overpriced but my daughter likes it and that's what matters
customer_reviews.author: Robert bose

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece she absolutely loves it. I think it is a little creepy but it’s super cool 😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Terrah Jo

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old is in love!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 4yo daughter for Christmas. She was head over heels the moment she opened it. She loves "taking care" of it. It does shut off by itself when not in use which is nice at bedtime so it doesn't wake her up. Great purchase?
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy2536

customer_reviews.title: I know she's going to love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter's birthday coming up in January. It is just sooooo cute I can't wait to give it to her. It does come with the batteries in and ON so it was meowing and hissing. It took a little to find the off button but it's off for now. I didn't want it meowing all this time. I know she's going to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jo.P

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as expected. We bought this for our five year old for Christmas. I was kinda worried it would shut up long enough to put under the tree, but it finally did. Batteries must be amazing, still going strong and I know it played and purred all night one night still in the box. My little girl was happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D Booth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful kitty
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cat for my 6 year old granddaughter for Christmas. It was fully activated and meowed and putred even after I wrapped it. It meowed and purred after I put it under her tree. Her 2 year old brother pointed at the package one tome and said "stop it". It was the first present she opened. She loves it. A great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia B. Tate

customer_reviews.title: too hard
customer_reviews.text: Fluffy on the outside but over a hard plastic. Not snuggly enough for small ones.
customer_reviews.author: E. Roxanna Brockert

customer_reviews.title: toddlers love
customer_reviews.text: my daughter (1.5yo) is OBSESSED with this toy. she packs it around everywhere. other than it being difficult to clean this toy has held up pretty well considering the usage.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: My four year old niece added this item to her Christmas wish list. She is going to be surprised by how cute this item is. Although, its driving us a little crazy...it suddenly starts meowing...scared me. I forgot about it and thought a cat had gotten into the house😊 Then it dawned on me...
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It does not work after 3 months of use even if with new batteries
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat
customer_reviews.text: The cat is cute, not really sure what it was supposed to do or how to interact with it but my kid loved it. It isnt a plush toy so the body is hard yet tha material is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Interactive CAT
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves this cat. Giggles abound when it hizzes and meows at her. She loves how the expression changes on the face of the cat too....the purring is another favorite activity.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The Fur-Real Kitten, "Bootsie" arrived in the original box with standard shipping and I'm very pleased. She began meowing the minute she was removed from the box. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Is as described on the video and pictures and no issues or damage upon delivery. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Lori E.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is going to love this for Christmas! Yes it’s annoying but we do these things for the kids we love
customer_reviews.author: Patrisha E. Dunsbergen

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is to cute , my daughter is still carrying it around and 6 months later it is still going strong love it 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Dads Hobby Room

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter absolutely loved this gift, she takes it everywhere and particularly likes how it purrs and whose when you walk by almost like a real kitten
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old loves
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my three year old. We live in a place where we can't have animals, and also I work too much to be able to take care of one. This made my daughter so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cassondra Garza

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: DAUGHTER LOVES IT! UPDATE: AND THREE MONTHS LATER IT DOESN'T WORK ANYMORE. UGH.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA B

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Much cuter than expected. Also, the color was different than any I saw in the local stores. Unfortunately it did not come in the fancy box like the ones seen in the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Batchelder

customer_reviews.title: like she does her baby dolls
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 2 year old for Christmas. She loves cats and this was no exception. I feared she may be scared of it, since it moves, but she carries it everywhere and sleeps with it at night, like she does her baby dolls.
customer_reviews.author: K. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Best thing and close to a real cat.
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves the interaction and kitty sounds. Mom is allergic to cats but her daughter loves cats, so this one is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Juroch

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new toy. My only complaint is the low volume level makes it hard to hear the cats noises. Overall I would recommend Amd but this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Hathcock

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for 3 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toy to give to my 3 year old daughter for Christmas. Very beautiful and I got it for a great price. I agree with the comments...she does make a lot of noise in the closet lol.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMOM1229

customer_reviews.title: The best toy ever
customer_reviews.text: The best toy ever! Kids love it! I bought it as a Birthday gift! The mom on the kid ask me from where I got it so she can buy one too for an upcoming birthday as a gift too! Really great present 🎁
customer_reviews.author: Mariya

customer_reviews.title: So realistic love it.
customer_reviews.text: This cat is.... AMAZING!!!!! Its so realistic and its moods and poses are just like a real cat. This is the perfect gift for Xmas or a birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Shayn

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few weeks and my daughter loved it, then suddenly stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a few weeks and my daughter loved it, then suddenly stopped working. We changed the batteries in hopes that that was the culprit but still nothing. Now I have a very sad 5 year old that "misses playing with her cat". Don't purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Real Like
customer_reviews.text: I was opening up the box and their was a cat meowing.....I was sure somehow we had a real cat in the box! This is going to be a Christmas present, so haven't done alot with it.
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn954

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it. Plays with it all the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Plays with it all the time. As real as you are going to get without the cat having a heartbeat. Parent tip: the off switch is on the bottom...you will really want to know this if you want to wrap it or make Bootsie quit meowing
customer_reviews.author: mvhouck

customer_reviews.title: Good for laughs and surprising friends!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly noisy cat. Is also light and sound sensitive. You'll never change another litter box again and always be entertained by this furry little pain in the butt!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi005

customer_reviews.title: Loved It!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter requested a “stuffed cat that can walk with you”. Although this kitty does not walk with you, she loves the interaction this toy gives!!!! Does all that is described!!!
customer_reviews.author: LadyT

customer_reviews.title: This item is so much fun..
customer_reviews.text: This item is so much fun.......it was hissing even before I got it out of the box........then under the tree it would make the sounds with no close contact.......no one even in the room......grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: shirley k davis

customer_reviews.title: ok for price
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo daughter loved the interaction, but immediately said that she wished it didn't have the eyebrows. I agree that they are not really cute, but as expression. I thought their earlier cats were cuter
customer_reviews.author: keeks62

customer_reviews.title: Noisy kitty
customer_reviews.text: Meows all the time and I am amazed it made it through delivery that way. This thing was sounding off at my door in the packaged box even in a dark garage. I was afraid the kids would hear it before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reinhart

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a Christmas present for our 2 year old daughter last year and a year later, she still loves it and plays with it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: got this as a Christmas present for my granddaughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: got this as a Christmas present for my granddaughter. it was almost $20 less than Target price. just wish the box did not meow when moved..guess its on a demo setting. really got my dogs crazy looking for a cat
customer_reviews.author: PAT

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, interactive toy! I bought for both my niece and daughter and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Adorable
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived, we set it down, and heard a purring noise. My husband reached to open it and was hissed at. Our dogs didn't know what to think when the box began to meow. It will be a wonderful gift for our granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: L. Steele

customer_reviews.title: just like a real cat
customer_reviews.text: I think she's cute but grandkids say she's kind of creepy because she just stares at them and then randomly mews or purrs or turns her head as they walk by. Hummm, just like a real cat... I like her.
customer_reviews.author: Jana D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my granddaughter. It is absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye#13

customer_reviews.title: My little Grand daughter will love it! However
customer_reviews.text: My little Grand daughter will love it! However,it is not to be cuddled. It is super hard. It arrived on time. It included batteries too. I guess I chose the wrong shipping box because it came in a unmarked brown box, not the original packaging - my bad. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing my granddaughter has had this cat for 3 years and yes it is still working and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Tina white

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Not one of those obnoxiously loud toys
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, perfect condition. Purchased this for my 4 year old daughter for Christmas, and she carries it everywhere with her. It meows, purrs, sings, and hisses, but it's not obnoxiously loud. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Mom

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I got this kitty as a present for my 4 year old niece. I loved playing with it. My dogs were not a fan. I was able to turn off the sound by reaching underneath the kitty's bottom so I didn't have to worry about it meowing before she unwrapped it.
customer_reviews.author: shana nelson

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Kat
customer_reviews.text: This FurReal Cat is so cute. My 89 year old mother-in-law loves it. All the residents at the ALF where she lives fell in love with it too. The price was much better than the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L.

customer_reviews.title: ... since some in family are allergic this will be awesome for her
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves cats and since some in family are allergic this will be awesome for her. A nice gift to give
customer_reviews.author: JCOhio

customer_reviews.title: One day toy
customer_reviews.text: It worked for one day. And this is it. I changed 3 sets of batteries, tried to turn it on and off. Nothing. Silence. And I can't return it since I'm not in USA now.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Krug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for cat loving children
customer_reviews.text: My son bought Bootsie for my granddaughter for her 2nd birthday and it was by far her favorite gift! She absolutely loves kitty cats and Bootsie did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: noisy
customer_reviews.text: This thing makes noise with any vibration, noise, or light, so we found that we had to cover it up and hide it so the kids could sleep. It's a neat present though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hakes

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my great grand daughter who is 3
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my great grand daughter who is 3. Not only did she love it but adults who have seen it Including myself...love it! Movements are smooth and not robotic. My real cat is actually jealous of it. The meow is that realistic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy
customer_reviews.text: This kitty is so cute! My granddaughter has had her eye on this for months when she sees it in the stores. I bought it for her for Christmas, she is going to be a happy girl.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Warner

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and came in excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and came in excellent condition . was worried since we bought out of the original box but it did not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and so do I
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and so do I. The cat is so cute and especially when it purrs as you are petting it.
customer_reviews.author: Uzzie97

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Bootsie is great but wished it came in original packaging. Disappointed with that only.
customer_reviews.author: B Miller

customer_reviews.title: 9yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This cat is funny. It has a little attitude And my 9 yr old is in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hazlewood

customer_reviews.title: Love the kitty
customer_reviews.text: Love the kitty....did not like that it came in a plsin brown box...no manufacturer box...no instructions. But kitty works and is very cute and realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Uher

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for my cat lover
customer_reviews.text: Super fun for my cat lover, even though that cat have give me some scares is pretty funny to see it when it gets mad is like my daughter
customer_reviews.author: mommytosma

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but didn't come as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great, daughter loves it, but it didn't come in original packaging and didn't come with the treat.
customer_reviews.author: stephana

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, but didn't come in a box.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and my daughter likes it, but came to me NOT in a box! Couldn't give it as a gift, but it was for my daughter, so it was okay. If you need it for a gift, as about the box first!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Great huggable toy with sounds and movements!
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy, my 6 year old Granddaughter loved it. a=And it made cute cat noises in the box before it was opened. Very cute, soft, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Once again for my 2 year old granddaughter, she loves it; soft and interactive
customer_reviews.author: Sweet cheeks

product_meta.title: FurReal Friends Bootsie
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard Packaging

 The loveable Bootsie pet is a furry little feline with a big personality! Change her moods just by playing with her. Give her a treat and she'll probably be happy… tap her mouth twice to make her cranky; pet her on her forehead to discover her latest mood! Pick up Bootsie and hold her close – she loves to be cuddled! No doubt about it, this cute feline is full of personality!


FurReal Friends and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.


BRAND STORY
By Furreal Friends
feature_bullets: Bootsie pet looks and acts just like a real kitty
Wave at her or tap her mouth with included treat for fun expressions
Includes Bootsie pet, treat and instructions.
